name: Sourdough Discard Granola Bars
ingredients: Mini chocolate chips to sprinkle over top
steps: Add coconut oil, sourdough discard, maple syrup to saucepan over medium-low and whisk for 2-3 min until the mixture begins to bubble. Remove from heat and whisk in vanilla and salt.
Combine the rest of the ingredients and mix until well combined
Press the mixture into a 9x9 dish lined with parchment paper. Sprinkle chocolate chips and press them in
Place in the fridge and allow them to set for a couple of hours before serving
